summary: "The Little Mermaid" is a literary fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen.
full_text:
"The Little Mermaid"  is a fairy tale by the Danish author Hans Christian Andersen about a young mermaid willing to give up her life in the sea and her identity as a mermaid to gain a human soul.
The tale was first published in 1837 and has been adapted to various media, including musical theatre and an animated film.
title: The Little Mermaid
